titleStmt.title: From a codex containing Peace and Knights

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Update meta as needed. TEXT: add *dicolon* to end of fr. 1 v.3; give the deleted line its own line number; add scribal acute in fr. 1 v.8; use |corr| tags in fr 1 v.9 instead of |subst|; replace : with *dicolon* in fr. 1 r.2-3, 8-9; add scribal apostrophe in fr. 1 r.3; use |subst| tags in fr. 1 r.4; use |corr| tags instead of |subst| in fr. 1 r.6 and then |reg| instead of |subst|; accent τί in fr. 1 r.8; add scribal diaeresis in fr. 1 r.9; the two rhos in fr. 1 r.10 are in square brackets; both sides of fr. 2 are lost.?lin at top and bottom; add asper in fr. 2 r.5; remove capitals at beginning of lines; replace : with *dicolon* in fr. 2 v.3; in fr. 2 v.4 add iota and regularize <:[φ]ησὶν|reg|[φ] 〚.1〛η̣ι̣σὶν:>; fix indentation in fr. 2 v.5-6; correct breathing in fr. 2 v.5 and use |subst| tags instead of 〚λ〛

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Update meta as needed. TEXT: add *dicolon* to end of fr. 1 v.3; give the deleted line its own line number; add scribal acute in fr. 1 v.8; use |corr| tags in fr 1 v.9 instead of |subst|; replace : with *dicolon* in fr. 1 r.2-3, 8-9; add scribal apostrophe in fr. 1 r.3; use |subst| tags in fr. 1 r.4; use |corr| tags instead of |subst| in fr. 1 r.6 and then |reg| instead of |subst|; accent τί in fr. 1 r.8; add scribal diaeresis in fr. 1 r.9; the two rhos in fr. 1 r.10 are in square brackets; both sides of fr. 2 are lost.?lin at top and bottom; add asper in fr. 2 r.5; remove capitals at beginning of lines; replace : with *dicolon* in fr. 2 v.3; in fr. 2 v.4 add iota and regularize <:[φ]ησὶν|reg|[φ] 〚.1〛η̣ι̣σὶν:>; fix indentation in fr. 2 v.5-6; correct breathing in fr. 2 v.5 and use |subst| tags instead of 〚λ〛
